author: jeremias
msg: Centralized Renderer and FOEventHandler creation in the RenderFactory class.

Provide a similar mechanism as for the Renderers to override the FOEventHandler being used to be able to plug in custom FOEventHandlers. (I don't particularly like this approach but so be it for the moment.)

author: jeremias
msg: Implement the cheaper mechanism to ensure correct rendering at differing resolutions. This is probably only an intermediate solution and does not implement what Thomas DeWeese suggested.
